George Coletti was named American League-Pitcher of the year !
In 33 games started, he pitched 238.2 innings, fanning 250 and walking 58 batters.
Carlos Lopez was named American League-Batter of the Year!
He batted .335 in 552 AB, with 43 homers and 115 RBI.
Dustin Baxter won the Gold Glove at First Base.
Clifford Brantner won the Gold Glove at Shortstop.
Final Record :
Wins : 102, Losses : 60, Pct. : .630, Position in Division : 1.
